Sentencas: In this research, a Simulink model of a standalone vehicular solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC) auxiliary power unit (APU) is developed.
Titulo: The modeling of a standalone solid-oxide fuel cell auxiliary power unit

Sentencas: The SOFC APU model consists of three major components: a controller model; a power electronics system model; and an SOFC plant model, including an SOFC stackmodule, two heat exchanger modules, and a combustor module.
Titulo: The modeling of a standalone solid-oxide fuel cell auxiliary power unit

Sentencas: This paper discusses the development of the nonlinear dynamic models for the SOFC stacks, the heat exchangers and the combustors.
Titulo: The modeling of a standalone solid-oxide fuel cell auxiliary power unit

Sentencas: When coupling with a controller model and a power electronic circuit model, the developed SOFC plant model is able to model the thermal dynamics and the electrochemical dynamics inside the SOFC APU components, as well as the transient responses to the electric loading changes.
Titulo: The modeling of a standalone solid-oxide fuel cell auxiliary power unit

Sentencas: It has been shown that having such a model for the SOFC APU will help design engineers to adjust design parameters to optimize the performance.
Titulo: The modeling of a standalone solid-oxide fuel cell auxiliary power unit

Sentencas: The modeling results of the SOFC APU heat-up stage and the output voltage response to a sudden load change are presented in this paper.
Titulo: The modeling of a standalone solid-oxide fuel cell auxiliary power unit

Sentencas: The fuel flow regulation based on fuel utilization is also briefly discussed.
Titulo: The modeling of a standalone solid-oxide fuel cell auxiliary power unit
The modeling of a standalone solid-oxide fuel cell auxiliary power unit
